description: Frontend developer at Borrowell, a Canadian FinTech with over 1.5 million users focused on providing financial stability through credit monitoring tools.

Work is split between the growth marketing platform - leveraging GatsbyJS (React) as a static site generator to make beautiful, user friendly, and SEO optimized web applications - and the mobile team, where I write web components with React Native.
I work on a cross functional team, collaborating with designers and project owners, as well as key stakeholders to deliver exceptional user experiences.

company: The Fields Institute at The University of Toronto
description: In house web application developer for a world renowned mathematical institute based out of the University of Toronto. Tasks are primarily creating modern frontend UIs in React/ Redux to interface with legacy APIs.
Worked on the retail support team in order to create and maintain employee portals and web applications.

My freelance work is largely focused on website design and refreshes. Experienced in creating internationalization to support multiple languages. I have worked with several CMS both traditional and headless. I also do custom React + Node web app development projects.
